Package com.revature.repo

Provides the repository classes which are used to interact with the database to retrieve and store information related to Revature batches, and their corresponding employees and associates.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssociateRepo
    Repository class used for persisting Associate data.
    BatchRepo
    Repository class used for persisting batch data.
    EmployeeBatchRepo
    Repository class used for persisting data linking an employee and a batch.
    EmployeeRepo
    Repository class used for persisting employee data.

Package com.revature.repo Description

Provides the repository classes which are used to interact with the database to retrieve and store information related to Revature batches, and their corresponding employees and associates.

The repository package comprises four classes, each associated with a distinct class from the com.revature.model package: AssociateRepo, BatchRepo, EmployeeRepo, and EmployeeBatchRepo. The Associate, Batch, Employee, and EmployeeBatch are persisted using their respective repo classes.

Since:
1.0
See Also:
com.revature.model
